A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a horrible film on many levels. It fails or violates most principles of conveying a story through pictures\, the largest is that there is no story. The characters have no arc\, growth or development. We are given no insight or answers to the burning questions left by episode VII. The director essentially raped and destroyed the character of Luke Skywalker--I can only assume Mr. Johnson did not watch the previous seven movies. This film broke me\, and I've lost all faith in humanity.
